name: FTVisualizer
body:
<VIDEO>

FTVisualizer is a tool that visualizes family trees. Since a lot of tools out there 
deal with static visualization of family trees (e.g. graphs), this tool focuses 
on building animated visualization based on dates (birthday dates, wedding dates, 
death dates,... etc). Using events and dates enables the tool to give a demonstration 
of how a family grew over a time period. 

The back-end (visualizer) was built using OpenGL, C++. The UI was build using AutoIt. For compiling instructions see [here]().
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
